events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund as the size does not fit me at all.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect sizing.
An available customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund because the jacket size wasn't right.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or still in original condition?
Sure, the order number is 789456123, and the jacket is still unworn with all tags attached.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using our prepaid label, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receiving the item.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the clear instructions. I'll send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and initiated the refund. The amount should reflect in your account shortly.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with how the case was handled.
Yes, the refund arrived yesterday. Thanks for the prompt help and clear communication throughout.
Closing this case now as the refund has been successfully completed and confirmed by the customer.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our refund process and service.
